page.title: 06GAMES WE PLAY
page.content:
{GAMES WE PLAY}
The games we play at school are quite easy to play.We play "stagger" which is when two people hold hands count to ten and then run after someone.When they have got all the people the last one who was tuck is on.Another game we play is "arch tick" which is when someone is on and when the other people are caught they put one hand on a wall.Then another person who isn't on comes and runs under there arm then they are free.The other game is "stuck in the mud" which is when someone is on and they tick someone,that person stops and puts their legs apart then someone who hasn't been tuck goes under their legs then their free.
